abstract: In a commencement speech, Manuel Pangilinan, one of the most respected businessmen in the Philippines, quoted Oprah Winfrey, Conan O’Brien, J. K. Rowling and President Obama, all without attribution.
snippet: In a commencement speech, Manuel Pangilinan, one of the most respected businessmen in the Philippines, quoted Oprah Winfrey, Conan O’Brien, J. K. Rowling and President Obama, all without attribution.
lead_paragraph: MANILA — As the chairman of the country’s largest phone networks and a philanthropist with a compelling rags-to-riches story, he is one of the most respected businessmen in the Philippines.

headline.print_headline: Wise Words, But They Were Not Original
